description.value: An extension to indicate the severity of the condition. A condition may cause few or mild symptoms and yet be serious, but the reverse is also possible.

purpose.value: This extension represents the Severity concept for implementations following the information standard [CiO](https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/Landingspagina_Contra-indicaties_en_Overgevoeligheden).
